content.text: What will you do about inflation?

Inflation is a TAX on the people, created by the Central Bank to fund the political caste. My solution? Abolish the Central Bank, embrace dollarization, and ensure that the State can no longer steal from citizens through monetary manipulation.

Entrepreneurs are the backbone of prosperity. I will eliminate useless regulations, slash taxes, and create an environment where innovation thrives. Argentina will become the CAPITALISM hub of Latin America!
The current system indoctrinates instead of educating. I will introduce school vouchers, empower families to choose, and make the education market competitive. No more collectivist brainwashing!
Subsidies are theft disguised as help. They distort markets, destroy competition, and create dependence. My goal is to cut subsidies, reveal real costs, and let the private sector flourish.
